title: [EVM Launchpad](/docs/build/transfers/native-token-transfers/deployment-process/evm-launchpad/)
content: Deploy using a simplified workflow. Recommended for testing or quick deployments.

title: [Manual EVM Deployment](/docs/build/transfers/native-token-transfers/deployment-process/deploy-to-evm/)
content: Deploy contracts manually using the NTT CLI for full control over the process.

title: [Deploy to Solana](/docs/build/transfers/native-token-transfers/deployment-process/deploy-to-solana/)
content: Use the Solana CLI to deploy NTT contracts. Suitable for Solana-native and cross-chain deployments.
